title: Ticket #234: Document Condor's OSG Gratia probe
description: The OSG Gratia probe for Condor occasionally needs some love from Flightworthy. I've had responsibility for this over the past few years. I'll create a Wiki page so someone else can pick up work on it if needed.
remarks:

See the GratiaProbe wiki page.
